Package common.worker

Class UsageReport

java.lang.Object
common.worker.Report
common.worker.UsageReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UsageReport extends Report implements Serializable
Represents a usage report for a park, detailing daily usage statistics and the park's capacity. This class extends the Report class to provide specific data fields and methods related to the usage of park facilities.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • UsageReport

      public UsageReport(Integer reportID, Report.ReportType reportType, int parkID, LocalDate date, int month, String comment, Map<Integer,Integer> dailyUsage, int parkCapacity)
      Constructs a new UsageReport with detailed information.
      Parameters:
      reportID - The unique identifier for the report.
      reportType - The type of report, which should be USAGE for instances of this class.
      parkID - The ID of the park to which the report is related.
      date - The date relevant to the report's data.
      month - The month for which the report provides data.
      comment - Any additional comments or notes associated with the report.
      dailyUsage - A map of daily usage data with days as keys and usage counts as values.
      parkCapacity - The maximum capacity of the park.

  • Method Details

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getDailyUsage()

      Returns:

    • getParkCapacity

      public int getParkCapacity()

      Sets the park's capacity.

    • updateDailyUsage

      public void updateDailyUsage(int day, int usage)
      Updates the usage data for a specific day of the month.
      Parameters:
      day - The day of the month.
      usage - The usage count for the specified day.
